message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your offer, but I can't go lower than $100.  This product is truly worth it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $70 is a more reasonable price.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference and settle at $85? That's my final offer.
I'm close to my budget, but I'd like to get a bit closer to the price I'm looking for.
